item.title: Kenshi Abe (阿部 拳之)
item.description: About Me Welcome to my web page! My name is Kenshi Abe and I am a research scientist at CyberAgent, Inc., AI Lab. I am interested in reinforcement learning, imperfect-information games, and multi-agent learning. Research Interests Reinforcement Learning Multi-agent Reinforcement Learning Partially Observable Markov Decision Problems Imperfect Information Games E-mail abekenshi1224[at]gmail.com SNS Github Twitter LinkedIn Blog and Presentation Qiita Research Blog SlideShare

Research International Conference Daiki Katsuragawa, Yusuke Kaneko, Kaito Ariu, Kenshi Abe. Efficient Creative Selection in Online Advertising using Top-Two Thompson Sampling WSDM 2025 (Industry day talks). [paper] Kenshi Abe, Mitsuki Sakamoto, Kaito Ariu, Atsushi Iwasaki. Boosting Perturbed Gradient Ascent for Last-Iterate Convergence in Games ICLR 2025. [paper] Yuu Jinnai, Tetsuro Morimura, Kaito Ariu, Kenshi Abe. Regularized Best-of-N Sampling with Minimum Bayes Risk Objective for Language Model Alignment NAACL 2025. [paper] Yuma Fujimoto, Kaito Ariu, Kenshi Abe.
